short_summary: The client NRC Aluminum Technology Center needs to purchase a quenching tank for aluminum die casting.
full_summary:
=========

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Quenching Tank
Réservoir de trempage

#### Reference Information

* Tender Reference Number: CB-670-92889886
* Solicitation Number: 23-58204
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: January 17, 2024
* Closing Date: February 13, 2024, at 14:00:00

#### Tender Status
The tender is expired.

#### Objective

The National Research Council Canada (NRC), through its Aluminum Technology Center (NRC-ATC) in Saguenay, requires the purchase of a quenching tank for aluminum die casting.

#### Procurement Details

* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region, NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding NCR)
* Contracting Entity: National Research Council Canada (CNRC)
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6

#### Contact Information

* Kacendra Dion, Contract Specialist
* Email: [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (438) 324-8125
* Address: 501 Boul. de l'Université Est, Saguenay, Québec

#### Tender Documents

Available at the following links:
* [23-58204_qa_quenching-tank---reservoir-de-trempage.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29723/23-58204_qa_quenching-tank---reservoir-de-trempage.pdf)
* [23-58204_npp_en_-quenching-tank-_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29723/23-58204_npp_en_-quenching-tank-_0.pdf)
* [23-58204_rfp_en_quenching-tank_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29723/23-58204_rfp_en_quenching-tank_0.pdf)

#### Closing Date and Time
February 13, 202
